title: How to customize admin view camaleon cms? [Ruby on Rails]
body:
I just started working with Camaleon Cms (Content Management System in Ruby on Rails), there is not much information available on internet about this CMS, that's why i am struggling with this for so many days.

The problem is i want to make some changes at admin section, i am able to customize the front-end but i don't know how to customize the admin view of this CMS.

The basic requirement is to change it's favicon in admin view. Please help me someone to sort out this issue.

Thanks.
